title: Chinese legends, gods and prophets
creator_credit: Sumner J. Glimcher and Mass Communications
brief_description: An introduction to oriental myth, religion and philosophy from the Shang Dynasty, 1766-l122 BC, to rites connected with ancestor worship as practised today in Taiwan.
